com.mesosphere.sdk.curator

Class CuratorPersister.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.curator.CuratorPersister.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    CuratorPersister

    public static class CuratorPersister.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for constructing CuratorPersister instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CuratorPersister build()
      Returns a new CuratorPersister instance using the provided settings, using reasonable defaults where custom values were not specified.
      CuratorPersister.Builder disableLock()
      Disables getting a curator lock before returning a CuratorPersister.
      CuratorPersister.Builder setCredentials(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Assigns credentials to be used when contacting ZK.
      CuratorPersister.Builder setRetryPolicy(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
      Assigns a custom retry policy for the ZK server.

        Assigns credentials to be used when contacting ZK.
        Parameters:
        username - The ZK username
        password - The ZK password

      • disableLock

        public CuratorPersister.Builder disableLock()
        Disables getting a curator lock before returning a CuratorPersister. This should only be invoked in tests.

      • build

        public CuratorPersister build()
        Returns a new CuratorPersister instance using the provided settings, using reasonable defaults where custom values were not specified.
